ca.corefacility.gview.data.readers
Interface FileFormatReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileFormatReader, CGViewTabReader, CGViewXMLReader, GFF3Reader, StandardSequenceFormatReader
public interface FileFormatReader

Defines an interface for reading in/extracting data and style for specific file formats.

Author:
Aaron Petkau

Method Detail

read

GViewFileData read(java.io.File file)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          GViewDataParseException
Reads GView data from the passed file.

Parameters:
file - The file to read from.
Returns:
A GViewFileData object filled out with the appropriate data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if some error occurred when reading from the file.
GViewDataParseException - If an error occurred when parsing the data.

canRead

boolean canRead(java.net.URI uri)
Determines if this reader can read the passed file.

Parameters:
uri - The uri for the file to test.
Returns:
True if we can read the file, false otherwise.

canRead

boolean canRead(java.io.BufferedInputStream inputStream)
Determines if this reader can read the passed input stream.

Parameters:
inputStream - The inputStream to test if it can be read.
Returns:
True if we can read the file, false otherwise.
